citations.narrative:
Rodent droppings were observed in the food storage area. In addition, a hole had been chewed in a bag of dog food.
Rodents may spread diseases and could contaminate the food. This could potentially cause the dogs to become ill. Food
must be stored in a manner which protects it from contamination and vermin infestation.
*********Correct by 1/14/24

Several of the doors for the outdoor enclosure runs were not secured at the bottom portion. Several dogs were seen
sticking their heads out. This could allow the dogs to become wedged or stuck and possibly lead to injury. All enclosures
must be constructed in a manner which contains the dogs securely. The licensee must correct this issue.
*******Correct by 1/14/24
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Rodent droppings were observed in the food storage area. In addition, a hole had been chewed in a bag of dog food. 
Rodents may spread diseases and could contaminate the food. This could potentially cause the dogs to become ill. Food 
must be stored in a manner which protects it from contamination and vermin infestation. 
*********Correct by 1/14/24 
3.6(a)(2)(iii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Several of the doors for the outdoor enclosure runs were not secured at the bottom portion. Several dogs were seen 
sticking their heads out. This could allow the dogs to become wedged or stuck and possibly lead to injury. All enclosures 
must be constructed in a manner which contains the dogs securely. The licensee must correct this issue.  
*******Correct by 1/14/24 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
